title: Knight Hero 2 Revenge Idle RPG
description: Knight Hero 2 Revenge Idle RPG is an exciting RPG platformer where you play as an undead hero seeking revenge. After being awakened from a centuries-old slumber, you must battle enemies and defeat powerful bosses. Upgrade your abilities, collect epic gear, and progress through unique worlds. With easy controls and rapid leveling, youâ€™re always in for an adventure.
